authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt William J. Kirkpatrick

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Singing I go along life's road, newline Praising the Lord, praising the Lord; newline Singing I go along life's road, newline For Jesus has lifted my load.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The trusting heart to Jesus clings, newline Nor any ill forebodes, newline But at the cross of Calvary sings, newline "Praise God for lifted loads!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The passing days bring many cares. newline "Fear not," I hear Him say; newline And when my fears are turned to prayers, newline The burdens slip away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He tells me of my Father's love, newline And never slumbering eye; newline My everlasting King above newline Will all my needs supply.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When to the throne of grace I flee, newline I find the promise true; newline The mighty arms upholding me newline Will bear my burdens too.
